CREATE CREDENTIAL MyCosmosDbAccountCredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'eOzYu2gvPpwAu4entMHlJHK94F81b3GJV6OXk2mQlj8m8XIlNuBrU1zVsvPq53dmlsLZbJtyTp7OfW5IxHtYhQ==';

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cdblink;Database=CosmosDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'RetailSales',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'MyCosmosDbAccountCredential'
) AS [RetailSales]
